pages.text: $(#0BE334)Item Added In Simply More$(br2)$()Smouldering Ruin is surviving proof that even a puny blade may lay waste to foes with extreme power. A strong scent of death is expelled from the crimson flames that envelop the blade, a lasting effigy of the masses slaughtered under its rule. Just
the slightest touch of the flames enveloping this weapon causes your soul to wither away, especially in the hands of a capable wielder.
